item_category: HAMMER Energy 2 is a 5.5-inch rugged smartphone with an armoured design and IP68 certified resistance. Realeased in 2020 as successor to the bestseller Energy, HAMMER Energy 2 is an optimal choice with outstanding features. This device offers great benefits to the user, including a powerful 5000 mAh battery with Express charging and power bank functionality.
review_title: Works perfect for what I want.
review_text: Worst phone ever do not purchase

I expected it to be more rugged but i dropped it on a flat floor it landed on its back and the screen cracked.   The main reason i bought it was for durabilty...so i would not recommend it for a durrable rugged phone...
Probably better buying a normal phone and buying a durable case ...
good for the money  long battery life sturdy
I'm autistic and very fussy what my phone is like. This hits all the right spots
My best phone so far feels good to hold not just a bit of flimsy plastic everything is solid quality.
